stimulusHtml: In a well-written essay, analyze how the series of events creates or reveals conflict and contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

features.html:
In some works of literature, a dream or vision experienced by a character initiates a series of events as the character attempts to decipher its meaning and respond appropriately. These events often establish or illuminate a conflict within the narrative.

Either from your own reading or from the list below, choose a work of fiction in which a character’s experience of a dream or vision sets such a sequence of events in motion. Then, in a well-written essay, analyze how the series of events creates or reveals conflict and contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole. Do not merely summarize the plot.

In your response you should do the following:

  • Respond to the prompt with a thesis that presents a defensible interpretation.
  • Provide evidence to support your line of reasoning.
  • Explain how the evidence supports your line of reasoning.
  • Use appropriate grammar and punctuation in communicating your argument.

The Agüero Sisters

The Alchemist

Angels In America

Beloved

Bless Me, Ultima

Death of a Salesman

Dreaming in Cuban

The House of the Spirits
